Package game.runes

Class RunesManager

java.lang.Object
game.runes.RunesManager
public class RunesManager
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing to manage all the runes inside the system. This class manage to add, deduct, transfer and get runes in the game world.
Author:
Tan Chun Ling, Wan Jack Liang, King Jean Lynn

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Add the specific amount of runes to runeHolder.

    Deduct the specific amount of runes from runeHolder.

    • registerRunesHeld

      public void registerRunesHeld​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor runeHolder, int amount)
      Register all the runeHolder and the amount in the game world.
      Parameters:
      runeHolder - the Actor who holds the current runes
      amount - the current amount where the Actor holds

    • transferRunes

      public int transferRunes​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor Enemy, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor runeHolder)
      Transfer the runes amount from the enemy to the runeHolder.
      Parameters:
      Enemy - the death enemy that drop the runes
      runeHolder - attacker of the enemy
      Returns:
      the amount of the total runes transfer

    • deductRunes

      public void deductRunes​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor runeHolder, int amount)
      Deduct the specific amount of runes from runeHolder.
      Parameters:
      runeHolder - the Actor that hold the runes.
      amount - the amount that needed to be deducted.

      Add the specific amount of runes to runeHolder.
      Parameters:
      runeHolder - the Actor that hold the runes.
      amount - the amount that needed to be added.
